channel.title: [First 10 Players Who Join Gets Korasi And Phat!]Minescape
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i43.tinypic.com/9fv0ap.png[/img][/center]
[center]Welcome to Minescape.
We are new as you notice :) weve been hosting on hamachi for a long time and weve been searching for alot of fixes into the source we use :D
So here we are :) we got our own site becouse we are running a clan for serveral games
We hope you will join our server and we hop you will stay and another thing we hope you recommend us to your friends
We just movedto a 637 source!!! well we hope you will enjoy it but we keep our old source running for those who love old scape ;) we are still searching on how to work with hex :/ but ye :) you can play on the 2 servers we hope you will enjoy everything on it and here is a lil picture of our new server ;)
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/14vgvac.png[/img]
[center][/url][/center]
[center]and here is our site: [URL=http://Minescape.org]Server Site[/URL]
[center]Media[/center] [center]Updated Pic's[/center] [Center]Home[/center] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/33u4fie.png[/img] [Center]New Monsters[/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/23tjnkk.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/11r92iv.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/23krv2d.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/2d121ja.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/qx85mo.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi42.tinypic.com/rs9dg0.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi41.tinypic.com/1zfr9eu.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/15y7t00.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi39.tinypic.com/2ywzcx3.jpg[/img][/Center] [Center][Img]http://oi40.tinypic.com/2hebhx0.jpg[/img][/Center] Something I Made [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PXh7yDuS2Qc[/youtube]
We announce that there is a contest running at the moment join in by playing and recording and editing your movie it has to be an intro! The best intro will be used as intro for our server + you get a price shown on the picture
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/104kj1w.jpg[/img]
We are hosting serveral games now from the oldschool habbos to minecraft to runescape :D and soon there will be more games you can play along our site ;) we hope you will enjoy this
Want a talk? add me on skype: CRUS_Lord_Supreme[/center]

that is not 562…(how can a 562 have torva? )
